verses.name: Ezekiel 41:3
verses.text: Then went he inward, and measured the post of the door, two cubits; and the door, six cubits; and the breadth of the door, seven cubits.

verses.name: Ezekiel 41:4
verses.text: So he measured the length thereof, twenty cubits; and the breadth, twenty cubits, before the temple: and he said unto me, This is the most holy place.

verses.name: Ezekiel 41:5
verses.text: After he measured the wall of the house, six cubits; and the breadth of every side chamber, four cubits, round about the house on every side.
